attributes.action: intervene to ensure that the Centre for Oxfordshire Studies has proper space within the new Westgate Centre at  Oxford
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ensure that the Centre for Oxfordshire Studies has a proper and large enough space provided in the Westgate and WestEnd developments in Oxford and is not sent away from the City Centre.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
